Get ESPN WNBA Standings

Source: R/espn_wnba_data.R
espn_wnba_standings.Rd

Get ESPN WNBA Standings

espn_wnba_standings(year)

Arguments

year

Either numeric or character (YYYY)

Value

Returns a tibble

Author

Geoff Hutchinson

Examples

# \donttest{
  try(espn_wnba_standings(year = 2021))
#>    team_id               team playoffseed wins losses winpercent gamesbehind
#> 1       18    Connecticut Sun           1   26      6     0.8125           0
#> 2       17     Las Vegas Aces           2   24      8       0.75           2
